Headline: CFO at Jio Haptik - Subsidiary of Jio Platforms | Strategy, Finance & Investor Relations
Comment:
Iâ€™ve seen four ways to buy time without raising money:

1. Protect margins with smarter structures and price, disciplined promotions.

2. Improve cash cycle through faster turns, better vendor terms, lighter SKUs.

3. Prioritise retention before reach by ensuring CAC payback. 

4. Kill weak bets quickly with frequent tests and clear stop losses.

A good rule is to avoid scaling acquisition until repeat purchase, CAC payback and inventory turns are all trending in the right direction.

The best founders use capital to slow the clock and discipline to speed the learning. That gap (read: time well used) is the real edge.
